company_id.title: Company ID
company_id.description: Can be found under QuickBooks account's "Account and Setting". Does not contain any spaces.

endpoint.title: Endpoint
endpoint.description: Select which endpoints you want to process.

fail_on_error.title: Fail on error
fail_on_error.description: When set to true, the component will halt the run upon encountering the first error. Alternatively, if set to false, the component will persist in processing all entries, storing any failed requests in the results table.
